price: Akasema: Sikukwambia hutaweza kuvumilia kuwa pamoja nami?
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا
footnotes: Yule mja mwema akasema: Mimi nilikwisha kwambia kuwa hakika wewe hutoweza kusubiri kuwa nami.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
